text: Skazhi (o prorok) lyudyam: "Znaniye Allakha ob"yemlet vsyakuyu veshch'. Yesli by voda v more sdelalas' chernilami dlya zapisi slov Allakha, dokazyvayushchikh Yego Vseob"yemlyushcheye Znaniye i Mudrost', to more issyaklo by prezhde, chem issyakli by Slova Gospoda moyego, dazhe yesli by My dostavili stol'ko zhe v pribavku k nemu
